entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:53 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
